FILING_SEQ_NO.desc: Unique positive numeric identifier for filing unit

form.2017: ITR-1 didn't see this on the form

AYEAR.desc: Assessment year of ITR form that include prior year information

PRFT_GAIN_BP_OTHR_SPECLTV_BUS.desc: Profits and Gains from BP other than speculative business

PRFT_GAIN_BP_SPECLTV_BUS.desc: Profits and Gains from speculative business

ST_CG_AMT_1.desc: 111A (STCG on shares units on which where STT paid) @ 15% under current law

ST_CG_AMT_2.desc: 115AD (STCG for FIIs on securities where STT not paid) @ 30% under current law

ST_CG_AMT_APPRATE.desc: STCG at regular rates as per current law

LT_CG_AMT_1.desc: LTCG at special rate 10% under current law

LT_CG_AMT_2.desc: LTCG at special rate 20% under current law

CYL_SET_OFF.desc: Current Year Losses to be set off

BFL_SET_OFF_BALANCE.desc: Brought Forward Losses to be set off

NET_AGRC_INCOME.desc: Agricultural income used for rate purpose

form.2017: ITR-1 Part C-C1 and ITR-3 Part B-TI-13c
Column 11 of Part B-TI of ITR-6
not used in filing unit tax calculations

Income_BP.desc: Computed income from Business and Profession)

Tax_ST_CG_RATE1.desc: Tax on Short Term Capital Gains at 15% under current law(Tax_SHORT_TERM_RATE1)

Tax_ST_CG_RATE2.desc: Tax on Short Term Capital Gains at 30% under current law (Tax_SHORT_TERM_RATE2)

Tax_ST_CG_APPRATE.desc: Tax on Short Term Capital Gains at the Regular Rate (Tax_SHORT_TERM_APPRATE)

Total_Tax_STCG.desc: Tax on all Short Term Capital Gains Tax_SHORT_TERM_RATE1 + Tax_SHORT_TERM_RATE2 + Tax_SHORT_TERM_APPRATE (Total_Tax_STCG)

Tax_LT_CG_RATE1.desc: Tax on Long Term Capital Gains at 10% under current law(Tax_LONG_TERM_RATE1)

form.2017: ITR-3 Schedule SI sum of lines 3-9

Tax_LT_CG_RATE2.desc: Tax on Long Term Capital Gains at 20% under current law (Tax_LONG_TERM_RATE2)

Total_Tax_LTCG.desc: Tax on all Long Term Capital Gains Tax_LONG_TERM_RATE1 + Tax_LONG_TERM_RATE2 under current law(Total_Tax_LTCG)

CY_Losses.desc: Computed Current Year Losses to be set off

BF_Losses.desc: Computed Brought Forward Losses to be set off

TI_special_rates.desc: Taxable Total Income (TTI) taxed at special rates

Aggregate_Income.desc: Income taxed at normal rates TTI minus TI_special_rates

Income_Rate_Purpose.desc: Agricultural/any other Income used for rate purpose

form.2017: ITR-1 Part C-C1 and ITR-3 Part B-TI-13c

tax_Aggregate_Income.desc: Tax liability on Income taxed at normal rates

tax_TI_special_rates.desc: Tax liability on TI taxed at special rates

tax_TTI.desc: Tax liability on TI which is tax_Aggregate_Income plus tax_TI_special_rates less agricultural rebate
